root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destiny
root.description: OverviewYu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destinyis a card battling game for the PC that is based of the popular Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. it is developed and published by Konami. The Player controles an unseen charactor as he/she dules againstYami Yugi useing cards from theYu-Gi-Oh!trading card game.
